alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Fayette; Harrison; Scott (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 11:20PM EDT until July 27 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Scott County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Bourbon County in central Kentucky... North central Fayette County in central Kentucky... Southwestern Harrison County in central Kentucky... * Until 1145 PM EDT. * At 1120 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Georgetown, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Shawhan, Ruddels Mills, Georgetown Scott County Airport, Leesburg, Alberta, Moon Lake Estates, Muddy Ford, Broadwell and Davis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
